title: ORA remote fails (inconsequentually) spectacularly on SSH connection failure

labels.name: RIA/ORA
labels.description: Issues related to RIA-based workflows and related components

body:
```
% datalad get -n MNINonLinear   
[INFO   ] scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                            
The authenticity of host 'hcp_a.ds.inm7.de (10.0.8.13)' can't be established.                                              
ED25519 key fingerprint is SHA256:lgHgWH1yXQmDidLyJ43ngKD1nIMbv5xKSItftk0dgVg.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? no
[INFO   ] Host key verification failed. 
The authenticity of host 'hcp_a.ds.inm7.de (10.0.8.13)' can't be established.
ED25519 key fingerprint is SHA256:lgHgWH1yXQmDidLyJ43ngKD1nIMbv5xKSItftk0dgVg.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? no
[INFO   ] Host key verification failed. 
[INFO   ] Traceback (most recent call last):
|   File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 694, in _wrap_handle_errors 
[INFO   ] return func(self, *args, **kwargs)
|   File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 1064, in initremote 
[INFO   ] self.get_store() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 1021, in get_store 
[INFO   ] self.verify_store() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 800, in verify_store 
[INFO   ] self._get_version_config(dataset_tree_version_file) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 983, in _get_version_config 
[INFO   ] file_content = self.io.read_file(path).strip().split('|') 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 1134, in io 
[INFO   ] self._io = SSHRemoteIO(self.storage_host, self.buffer_size) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 314, in __init__ 
[INFO   ] self.ssh.open() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/fasteners/lock.py", line 302, in wrapper 
[INFO   ] return f(self, *args, **kwargs) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/sshconnector.py", line 556, in open 
[INFO   ] stderr, 
[INFO   ] datalad.support.exceptions.ConnectionOpenFailedError: ConnectionOpenFailedError: 'ssh -fN -o ControlMaster=auto -o ControlPersist=15m -o ControlPath=/home/mih/.cache/datalad/sockets/e1f32738 hcp_a.ds.inm7.de' failed with exitcode 255 [Failed to open SSH connection (could not start ControlMaster process)] 
[INFO   ]  
[INFO   ] During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
| 
| Traceback (most recent call last):
|   File "/usr/bin/git-annex-remote-ora", line 11, in <module>
|     load_entry_point('datalad==0.15.0', 'console_scripts', 'git-annex-remote-ora')()
|   File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 1415, in main 
[INFO   ] master.Listen() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/annexremote/annexremote.py", line 860, in Listen 
[INFO   ] reply = self.protocol.command(line) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/annexremote/annexremote.py", line 549, in command 
[INFO   ] reply = method() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/annexremote/annexremote.py", line 571, in do_INITREMOTE 
[INFO   ] self.remote.initremote() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 714, in _wrap_handle_errors 
[INFO   ] self.io.close() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 1134, in io 
[INFO   ] self._io = SSHRemoteIO(self.storage_host, self.buffer_size) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/distributed/ora_remote.py", line 314, in __init__ 
[INFO   ] self.ssh.open() 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/fasteners/lock.py", line 302, in wrapper 
[INFO   ] return f(self, *args, **kwargs) 
[INFO   ] File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/sshconnector.py", line 556, in open 
[INFO   ] stderr, 
[INFO   ] datalad.support.exceptions.ConnectionOpenFailedError: ConnectionOpenFailedError: 'ssh -fN -o ControlMaster=auto -o ControlPersist=15m -o ControlPath=/home/mih/.cache/datalad/sockets/e1f32738 hcp_a.ds.inm7.de' failed with exitcode 255 [Failed to open SSH connection (could not start ControlMaster process)] 
[INFO   ] external special remote protocol error, unexpectedly received "<EOF>" (unable to parse command) 
[INFO   ] unable to use special remote due to protocol error 
[INFO   ] Fetching 'http://hcp_a.ds.inm7.de/b39/38740-b3a6-4073-ac5b-6a5ef47abc01/config' 
[INFO   ] Reconfigured inm7-storage for ria+http://hcp_a.ds.inm7.de 
[INFO   ] Fetching 'http://hcp_a.ds.inm7.de/b39/38740-b3a6-4073-ac5b-6a5ef47abc01/config' 
[INFO   ] Configure additional publication dependency on "inm7-storage" 
install(ok): /tmp/inm7-superds/original/hcp/hcp_aging/HCA6002236_V1_MR/MNINonLinear (dataset) [Installed subdataset in order to get /tmp/inm7-superds/original/hcp/hcp_aging/HCA6002236_V1_MR/MNINonLinear]

```

Ping @bpoldrack
